title: Sysmon Registry Run Key Persistence
description: Detects modifications to common Windows Run keys used for persistence.
sigma:
title: Sysmon Registry Run Key Persistence
id: RULE-006
description: Detects modifications to common Windows Run keys used for persistence.
author: detpack-lab
status: stable
logsource:
  product: windows
  service: sysmon
detection:
  selection:
    EventID: 13
    TargetObject|contains: "\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run"
    Details|contains: "\\AppData\\"
  condition: selection
falsepositives:
  - Legitimate software installation or updates
level: high
tags:
  - attack.t1547
  - attack.persistence
